import { Outlet, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import backgroundImage from "./../img/flickr-banner.jpg" const Layout = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [user, setUser] = useState({}) const login = async () => { const response = await fetch('/api/user/' + username + '/' + password) const data = await response.json() console.log(data) if (data.user && data.user.username) { setUser(data.user) // window.location = '/products' } else { alert('invalid username or password') } } return ( <>
